name: Chromagic Enhanced
description:
Enhanced version of Chromagic game.

Choose your magic, enter into the arena and face your opponent to become the master of the chromatic circle!

Features include:

- tutorial

- two mini campaigns for singleplayer mod (one for each kind of magic)

- two players mod

- customizable keybinds

- two languages are supported (english and french) 

- possibility to add more languages : copy all files for a given language, set their names to DefinedFileType_YourLanguage.ini and translate it. Don't forget to add your language at the end of languages.ini file.

- possibility to add more backgrounds (+ their ambient and static lightings) and scene transitions

Possible errors:

- If the game is not running at first use, go in "Config" folder, open graphics.ini file  and set all 4 lightings to 0.

- If at first use you get the following error:

"Failed to compile vertex shader: 0(2): error C5060: out can't be used with non-varying vertexPosition

Go in Resources/Shaders/Lights folder, open pointLight.vert and spotLight.vert files and replace "out vec4 vertexPosition;" by "varying out vec4 vertexPosition;".
